dtc.title: Web Developer
dtc.description: Creation of pages on the Digital Test Center website using the Vue.js, Nuxt.js and Tailwind CSS frameworks

pvv.title: Communications manager
pvv.description: Overall communication for club events (social networks, posters, flyers, etc.), creating content for the club's social networks, managing and sending out the newsletter

epage.title: Communications manager
epage.description: Organisation of official ceremonies, management of social networks, creation of print media

master.title: Masters in Information, Public Communication and the Media

licence.title: Professional degree in Sustainable Development of Territories through e-Commerce and e-Tourism

dut.title: Associate's Degree in Administrative and Commercial Management of Organisations

social.title: Social Media Manager
social.description: Day-to-day management of the Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn accounts: planning and publishing content, animating communities, moderating comments and private messages. Creating attractive visuals, writing texts adapted to each platform, and monitoring performance using analysis tools. Objective: to develop brand awareness, boost engagement and support marketing objectives.

graphic.title: Graphic design
graphic.description: Production of graphic media such as flyers and posters, from conception to completion, ensuring that a clear, impactful message is conveyed. Each creation is designed to respect the client's visual identity and adapt to the context of distribution (print or digital).

newsletter.title: Newsletter management
newsletter.description: Designing, writing and sending newsletters in line with the editorial line and communication objectives. This includes creating visuals, structuring content, optimising design for all media (responsive), and analysing performance (open rates, clicks, etc.).

development.title: Web Developer
development.description: Design and development of websites, both via CMS such as WordPress and through bespoke development in pure code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, etc.). Ability to adapt technical solutions to the needs of the project, while guaranteeing performance, responsiveness and a good user experience.
